Question: Natalie Maullin said she met this person in April 2006 in Cedars-Sinai Medical Centre.
Hints: Becoming one of Playboy's most popular models, this person was heavier and larger than the typical Playboy model.
In late 2006, this person was granted permanent resident status in the Bahamas by Immigration Minister Shane Gibson.
Anna Nicole gave birth to their son, Daniel Wayne ****, on January 22, 1986.
